name: ods-charts
description: ODS Charts is based on Apache ECharts and provides Orange charts components.
author: Orange SA

scripts.docs:build: rm -rf ./docs/dist && npm run typedoc && npm run astro:build
scripts.install:lib: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm run install:all && npm run serve
scripts.install:all: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-echarts && npm i && cd ../angular-ng-boosted && npm i && cd ../angular-ngx-echarts && npm i && cd ../react && npm i && cd ../vue && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.install:all-deep: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ./test/angular-echarts/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../angular-ng-boosted && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../angular-14/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../angular-ngx-echarts && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../react && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../vue && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../.. && npm run install:all
scripts.install:angular-ngx-echarts: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-ngx-echarts && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-ngx-echarts
scripts.install:angular-ng-boosted: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-ng-boosted && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-ng-boosted
scripts.install:angular-echarts: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-echarts && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-echarts
scripts.install:angular-14: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-14 && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-14
scripts.install:react: npm i && npm run build && cd test/react && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:react
scripts.install:vue: npm i && npm run build && cd test/vue && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:vue
scripts.netlify: npm run build && npm run docs:build
scripts.release: npm i && npm run build && npm pack && npm publish
scripts.release-docs:
npm i && npm run docs:build && git add . && git fetch -p && git switch gh-pages && git pull && rm -rf ./index.html && rm -rf ./versions/index.html && cp -r docs/dist/* . && git add . && echo "

git checkout -b gh-pages-*" && echo "git commit -m "chore(release): vx.y.z :rocket:"" && echo "git push"
scripts.typedoc: rm -rf docs/static/[version]/api && typedoc src/ods-charts.ts --out docs/static/[version]/api --disableSources --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --readme docs/src/content/README.md && node build/add_head.mjs
scripts.build:angular-ngx-echarts: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-ngx-echarts && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-ngx-echarts
scripts.build:angular-ng-boosted: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-ng-boosted && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-ng-boosted
scripts.build:angular-echarts: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-echarts && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-echarts
scripts.build:angular-14: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-14 && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-14
scripts.build:react: npm i && npm run build && cd test/react && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:react
scripts.build:vue: npm i && npm run build && cd test/vue && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:vue
scripts.test:angular-ngx-echarts: cd test/angular-ngx-echarts && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-ngx-echarts
scripts.test:angular-ng-boosted: cd test/angular-ng-boosted && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-ng-boosted
scripts.test:angular-echarts: cd test/angular-echarts && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:angular-echarts
scripts.test:react: cd test/react && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:react
scripts.test:vue: cd test/vue && npm i && npm run build && cd../.. && npm run serve:vue
